C Partnership - P Sole Ownership - S Small Business Personal Liability (SBPL) - B</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>The business type 'B' (SBPL) can be used for account inquiry only (it cannot be used for account creation and update).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CLLI11Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Common Language Location Identifier in 8 or 11 character format. Relates to a successfully validated Service Address - sbcServingOfficeWirecenter. Mobile To Mobile M2A - Mobile to Application M2W - Mobile to Web A2M - Application To Mobile E2M - Email to Mobile W2M - Web To Mobile M2E - Mobile to Email M2P - Mobile to Personal Storage Locker (PSL)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="M2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2A"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2W"/> <xs:enumeration value="A2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="E2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="W2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2E"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CashierIdInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CheckAccountTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Checking, Savings, Financial Institution</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:enumeration value=""/> <xs:enumeration value="Checking"/> <xs:enumeration value="Savings"/> <xs:enumeration value="Other"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CombinedBillingStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Where: Y - Combined N - De-Combined, Not Enrolled P - Pending Combine D - Combined Billing Declined F - Future Dated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value=" "/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CompanyNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CountryCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>International standard (ISO) 3166-1 alpha-3 country code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="3"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CoverageAreaInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Local-L, Regional-R, National-N</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditApplicationTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRR - Format = YYMM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditCardNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name on Credit Card</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditCardTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of credit card used for transaction: AE - American Express, DINE - Diner's Club, DISC - Discovery Card, MC - Master Card, VISA - Visa Card</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="AE"/> <xs:enumeration value="DINE"/> <xs:enumeration value="DISC"/> <xs:enumeration value="MC"/> <xs:enumeration value="VISA"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditClassInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines the credit risk CARE Markets: 1-8, P (description varies by accountType) Telegence Markets: A - Government Account, B - Known Good Credit, C - Unknown Credit, D - Known Poor Credit, E - Employee, M - MABEL (Major Account Billing Exchange Logistical)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditDebitIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>8 for a normal credit card request. 16 for a debit request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="8"/> <xs:enumeration value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CrossBoundaryStateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Received from LIM BIS. SMS Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>MMS - MMS Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>GPRS - GPRS Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>VSC - Video Sharing Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>IMB - Integrated Messaging Bucket</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>SMI - SMS to International Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>MMI - MMS to International Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>VXC - MMS - Personal Studio</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="GPRS"/> <xs:enumeration value="VSC"/> <xs:enumeration value="IMB"/> <xs:enumeration value="SMI"/> <xs:enumeration value="MMI"/> <xs:enumeration value="VXC"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateTimeWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date/time stamp in UTC format. The following formats are accepted: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.xxxZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - T is a fixed character, indicating the time section - hh indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - mm indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - ss indicates the second, zero pre-pended - xxx indicates the millisecond, zero pre-pended - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"> <xs:pattern value=".+T.+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date in UTC format. The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DDZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"> <xs:pattern value=".+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithoutTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date with no timezone information. The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DD Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DeviceNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>User-friendly description of the device.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DeviceViolationTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>'T' = Tethering, 'S' = SIM Swap, 'F' = Features, 'A' = Activation, 'U' = Device Updation, 'M' = Family Manager</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="T"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DoNotMailBillIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Print and Hold = P, No Bill Printed = X, No Bill Presented Online = E. N = Bill will be printed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="X"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DoingBusinessAsInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Doing business as field</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DoubleDiscountRestrictionTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Subscriber Level = S, BAN Level= B</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EarlyTerminationFeeTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This field specifies the early termination fee type</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>E - Device</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>F - fixed</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>D - declining based on amortization schedule establieshed by the business</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EffectiveDateInfo"> <xs:restriction base="DateWithTimezoneInfo"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ElectronicSerialNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Electronic Serial Number of the cellular unit. billing number) is available).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="J"/> <xs:enumeration base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PamPaymentMethodInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the Method of Payment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction <xs:simpleType name="PdpNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>PDP Name</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="3"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> <xs:pattern value="([a-z]|[A-Z]|[0-9]){3,16}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneLastFourDigitsInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="4"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNpaNxxInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhonePrefixInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type used to represent an NPA or NXX fields. One type is used so that the restriction is applied to both.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="3"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PlanTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of PricePlan : I - Individual, F - Family, B- BAN Level</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PricePlanDescriptionInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PricePlanStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Status of PricePlan: A - Active, G - GrandFathered</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="G"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PricePlanTechnologyTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The field determines the price plan compatibility with the technology type. Options are GSM, TDMA and BOTH.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="GSM"/> <xs:enumeration value="TDMA"/> <xs:enumeration value="BOTH"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PriorityAccessServiceSpecialHandlingInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid for Additional Offerings only. Value B indicates that the offering will handled as a bundled offering on Care side and additional offering on the Telegence side</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ProcessTransactionIDInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique identifier to track any specific instance of a stateful process</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="500"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ReceiptTransactionTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment Receipt Transaction Type. The possible values: PU - Purchase, VO - Void, RE - Refund, RR - Refund Reversal, CB - Chargeback, CR - Chargeback Reversal</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CB"/> <xs:enumeration value="CR"/> <xs:enumeration value="PU"/> <xs:enumeration value="RE"/> <xs:enumeration value="RR"/> <xs:enumeration value="VO"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RecordFormatInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the source of the transaction. Retail = R, Paystation = S, eCommerce = H, Phone = P, Recurring = W</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="W"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RoamingIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The home or roaming indicator</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>H - Home, R - Roaming (Domestic), I - Roaming (International), B - Both Domestic on Net and Domestic Roaming, D - DSL, U - U-verse, L - Long Distance, A - IPUB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SalesRepresentativeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sales Representative ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedBankAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Bank Account Number. All Characters must be UPPER CASE and NUMERIC, Following special charcaters are pass thourgh & - ; @ \ ^ | EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: BANK_NUM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="4"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DO NOT USE THIS TYPE IN SCHEMAS - Base type for encrypted elements, Always use derived/extended types listed below</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedCreditCardNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text full or partial Credit Card Number. When sending plain text send only numbers. Dashes are pass through charcaters. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: CC_NUM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="12"/> <xs:maxLength value="19"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedDateOfBirthInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Date of Birth The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DD Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: BIRTH_DATE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:pattern value="\S{4}-\S{2}-\S{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedGenericInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Used for data that needs to be BASE64 encoded. Clients who are volted need to pass in a minimum of 15 characters - see the CSO BASE64 documentation to find details on how to pad stings to reach the 15 character limit. Following special charcaters are pass through [space] EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: B64_GENERIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedNumericPassCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Pin .When sending plain text - only numeric values are allowed. Following are pass through characters space & - ; @ \ ^ | EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: ALLNUM_PIN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="4"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedPersonalIdentificationInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Personal Ids. Characters must be UPPER CASE. Ex:Drivers License Number and other personal Ids. Dashes are pass through characters. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: DRIVER_LIC_NUM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="6"/> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedSecurityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text CVV2/CID/CVC value for credti cards. When sending plain text send only numbers. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: CV_ALLNUM_PIN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="3"/> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedSocialSecurityNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Social Security Number, also used for Business Tax Id. When sending plain text send only numbers. Dashes are pass through characters. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: ALLNUM_SSN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:length value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceAreaDescriptionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The description for the service area code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceAreaInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The auxiliary service code Code - Description - Line Required GPR - GPRS Service - N ALT - Alternate Line Service - Y DTA - Data Line Service - N FAX - Fax Service - Y FXM - Fax Mailbox Service - Y WAP - Wireless Internet Service - N PTT - Kodiak Push-to-Talk - N</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="GPR"/> <xs:enumeration value="ALT"/> <xs:enumeration value="DTA"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAX"/> <xs:enumeration value="FXM"/> <xs:enumeration value="WAP"/> <xs:enumeration value="PTT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SessionBasedOrderConfirmationNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A unique number assigned when the order is created in BalanceManager</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SessionIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Turbo Session Id for Prepaid Mobile Subscribers</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SocOrderIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>unique, persistent identifier to be associated with any Active or expired SOC to allow tracking those SOC instances against the Mobile order.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SocialSecurityNumberLastFourDigitsInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Last four digits of the SSN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="4"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SourceSystemIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Optional, please set to something reasonable for your system to help meet reporting requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="StockKeepingUnitInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Stock Keeping Unit - sku</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubjectInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Subject Line</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberIdInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="120"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberIdentityModuleInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SIM is used with GMS technology based devices. This field identifies the SIM number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Mobile Telephone Number associated with this serial number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>RESERVED - R, ACTIVE - A, CANCELLED - C, SUSPENDED - S, RELEASED - L</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriptionClassInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Class of subscriber: possible values are: "S" => OnStar, "U" => Audi, "V" => Volvo, "E" => OnStar Europe</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TaxExemptionRequestInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Used to request tax exemption. Not editable once Tax Exempt Entity Type is set</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TechnologyTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Literal representation of the technology type: GSM = the mobile is homed to a GSM switch but does not have the GAIT feature; GSM-GAIT = the mobile is homed to a GSM switch and has the GAIT feature; GAIT = the mobile is GAIT enabled TDMA = the mobile is homed to a TDMA switch but does not have the GAIT feature; TDMA-GAIT = the mobile is homed to a TDMA switch and has the GAIT feature. GSM-UMTS = the mobile is homed to a GSM switch and has the UMTS feature UMTS = the mobile is UMTS enabled LTE= Long Term Evolution Based on the technology some fields are required for the device ESN is used with Tdma technology based devices or GAIT capable devices SIM is used with GMS technology or UMTS feature based devices IMSI and IMEI is used with GSM technology or UMTS or GAIT capable devices</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:enumeration value="GSM"/> <xs:enumeration value="TDMA"/> <xs:enumeration value="GSM-GAIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="GAIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="TDMA-GAIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="GSM-UMTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="UMTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="LTE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Standard 10 digit Telephone Number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TermsConditionsStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>WEB Accepted - "W", Physical Signature - "S", Pending (regular activations) - "P", Required, but pending (WLNP only) - "Y", Prepaid/Reseller Status - "N", B2B Status - "B", IVR Status - "I", Verbal (for rate plan changes with a commitment of 11 months or less only) - "V", third party IVR accepted (applicable to rateplan changes only ) "T", CBO Accepted - "C", Affiliate accepted - "E", Signature Capture Device(for OPUS) - X</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="T"/> <xs:enumeration value="V"/> <xs:enumeration value="W"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="X"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Time24HoursInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This field uses a 24 hour format of 'HH:MM' where 'H' stands for hours (00-23) and 'M' stands for minutes (00-59).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="([01][0-9]|2[0123]):[012345][0-9]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TimeUOMInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The time unit of measurement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="MINUTES"/> <xs:enumeration value="HOURS"/> <xs:enumeration value="DAYS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TimeWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a time stamp in UTC format. The following formats are accepted: hh:mm:ssZ or hh:mm:ss.xxxZ Where : - hh indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - mm indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - ss indicates the second, zero pre-pended - xxx indicates the millisecond, zero prepended - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:time"> <xs:pattern value=".+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UMTSCompatibleIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An indicator showing compatibility with Cingulars 3 G U = UMTS compatible B = value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="URLInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniform Resource Locator</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2000"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UniqueKeyInfo"> <xs:annotation> A = ACDS, B = BASIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="VISA"/> <xs:enumeration value="MASTERCARD"/> <xs:enumeration value="AMERICAN EXPRESS"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHECKING"/> value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{3}[0-9,a-z,A-Z]{1}\d{2}[0-9,a-z,A-Z]{1}\d{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="WirelineYearInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:complexType name="AccountBalanceInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This structure contains summary level account balance information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="currentAmountDue" type="AmountInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This field represents the current amount due.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="totalAmountDue" type="AmountInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This field represents the total amount due for this account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="totalAmountPastDue" type="AmountInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This field represents the total of all past due amounts.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="taxAmount" type="AmountInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Total tax amount for the previous bill.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> name="recurringCreditCardBillingIndicator" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether or not an account has recurring credit card billing.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="depositDue" type="AmountInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="includeEquipmentCharges" type="BooleanStringInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>include equipment charges in bill</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AccountStatusInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A - Active [Telegence os (O)pen], C - Charge-Off, W - Write-Off, T - Temporary/Tentative, N - New, D - Closed [not used by The order of CASS lines if Billing/Business Name is present: 1. Billing name (Account name), e.g., John Smith 2. Building name/company name /business name (if exists - relevant for billing/alternate address only), e.g., XYZ Company 3. Address line - apt number (if applicable), e.g., Apt 1010 4. Address line - house number, street and directional (if applicable), e.g.,123 Main St. W 5. City, state, and zip, e.g., San Francisco CA 94123-4567
If the length of the address line (#4) which includes the house number, street and directional is above 30 characters they should be adjusted it to fit into 30 characters. If the 2 address lines 3 and 4 can fit together in the 30 characters limit then they will concatenate it and store them as one line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="addressLine" maxOccurs="5" minOccurs="2"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CheckDataInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="routingNumber" type="BankRoutingNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Routing/Transit (ABA) number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankAccountNumber" type="SecureEncryptedBankAccountNumberInfo"/> <xs:element name="checkNumber" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="bankAccountHolderName" type="NameCombinedInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the bank account holder</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="accountType" type="CheckAccountTypeInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of checking account. If populated, the valid values are [Checking], [Savings], [Other]</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element default="false" name="businessBankAccountIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:documentation>The type of classification.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ContractTermInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="startDate" type="DateWithTimezoneInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="term" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This is the term for the contract which is the number of months for the contract</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Commission" type="DealerCommissionInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditCardInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="creditCardType" type="CreditCardTypeInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="CardNumber"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="maskedCreditCardNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Masked Credit Card Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength type="CreditCardExpirationDateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Credit card expiration date. Format = YYMM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditCardCustomerName" type="CreditCardNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name on Credit Card</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amount" type="AmountInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be billed to CreditCard. To Validate card send no amount to Validate and reserve funds enter an amount greater that 0.00.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Address" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="CreditCardBillingAddress" type="AddressInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="useCustomerBillingAddress" type="xs:boolean" fixed="true" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cashierId" type="CashierIdInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="creditDebitIndicator" type="CreditDebitIndicatorInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>8 for a normal credit card request. 16 for a debit request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="overrideBillingZipCheck" type="OverrideBillingZipCheckInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If conducting a transaction which normally requires a successful AVS result, set this flag to override the AVS requirement. 1 (true), 0 (false)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="sourceSystemId" type="SourceSystemIdInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Optional, please set to something reasonable for your system to help meet reporting requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="recordFormat" type="RecordFormatInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the source of the transaction. -REAR, LOWER -LOWR, LOBBY -LBBY, SIDE -SIDE, UPPER-UPPR, SPACE-SPC, #-APT Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> in parked state</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="hlrLocation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The HLR where the SIM The pointer to begin data retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cycle" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Internal Use Only. [This or addressID required for E911ADDRESS validation.]</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="crossBoundaryState" type="cng:CrossBoundaryStateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>LIM - This is the cross-boundary state for an address. This is only applicable for Southeast addresses.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="alternativeNearByIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicator that defines the alternative adddress option for response. If client provides this field=true, backend will only validate base address data. The supplemental address data validation will be ignored. Backend will not return any supplemental locations associated with the basic address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element default="U" name="mode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the backend system where address validation will be performed. R=Reverse GeoCode validation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="G"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="AddressList" type="cng:AddressFieldedUnfieldedInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exact match: list of addresses with specific addressType. Address data is in "Fielded" format structure.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="LivingUnitProperties"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Living Unit related properties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sbcServingOfficeWirecenter" type="cng:CLLI8Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The 8 character Common Language Location Identifier code that indicates the wire center that serves this address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ownedWiringIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Owned wiring indicator for SW region.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="workingServiceOnLocationIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>OVALS/MLDB derives WSOPI (Working Service On Premise Indicator) and set to true if there is working service (at least one working TN) at the location.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="areaTransferCutDate" type="cng:DateWithoutTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE Network facilities AREA Transfer cut live date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="areaTransferNumberChangeDate" type="cng:DateWithoutTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE Network facilities Area Transfer number change date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="areaTransferNPANXX" type="cng:PhoneNpaNxxInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE Network facilities Area Transfer impacted NPA and NXX.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="areaTransferWireCenter" type="cng:CLLI11Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE Network facilities AREA Transfer wire center CLLI. Sample value: BRHMALMT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="TelephoneNumberList"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Telephone number related properties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="telephoneNumber" type="cng:WirelineTelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Telephone number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="telephoneNumberStatus" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Returns Working TN only.Telephone Number status. i.e. indicates that the TN is working or non-working. N Non-Working P Pending SB Sublet SS Suspend U Unknown W Working.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="telephoneNumberActivityDate" type="cng:DateWithoutTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Telephone number activity date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quickServiceIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE quick service Indicator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quickDialToneIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>West region CA Quick Dial Tone Indicator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="facilityAvailableIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Facility Available Indicator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="CommonLocationProperties"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Common location related properties for all address types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="region"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The regional SAG data source that OVALS/MLDB received the SAG Range data from. Values are: W, E, MW, SW, SE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sagWireCenter" type="cng:CLLI11Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The regional SAG wirecenter name. Sample value: STLS,421</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="exchangeCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The exchange code for the sag range record. Sample value: KWD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sagNPA" type="cng:PhonePrefixInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The number plan area code (NPA) in which the geographic segment for the specific SAG range is contained.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetAddressGuideArea" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SAG area code (aka SAGA). This is present in SW W and MW. Sample value: SUBA</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="legalEntity" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A code representing the Local Exchange Carrier responsible for addresses within this Geographic Segment. Sample value: TM00</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="geoSegmentCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Geographic Segment Code associated with this Primary Address entry. Sample value: G307</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="localProviderName" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains a value to indicate that ATT is the CLEC instead of the ILEC for the geographic area. This column will contain the ILEC for the EXCO.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="centralOfficeCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Data loaded by concatenating fields CENTRAL-OFFICE-1-2 and CENTRAL-OFFICE-3 on the ASON SAG Extract file. MW and W only. Sample values: AB, 713</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ttaCode" type="cng:PhonePrefixInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Terminating Traffic Area is a geographic zone where a specific group of telephone numbers has been allocated to subscribers for rate purposes. Sample value: 821</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rateZone" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The rate zone of code for the rate zone in which the geographic segment is located. Sample value: TX1</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rateZoneBandCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MW Rate Zone Band. Sample value: B</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tarCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The tax area rate code (TAR) or the code for the tax structure levied on customers in the geographic segment. Sample value: KWD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="primaryDirectoryCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The code for the directory or directories in which listings for the customers in the geographic segment will appear without charge. Sample value: TUL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="telephoneFeaturesCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The telephone features or code for the features which can be offered to customers in the geographic segment. Sample value: EAS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="lataCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>OVALS/MLDB derives this from a LFACS WIRECENTER table internally. Sample value: 720</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="businessOfficeCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A code identifying the Residence Service Center (RSC) serving the customers in the geographic segment. Sample value: DBS-PROF</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="localRemarkText" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Used to identify one data item that is specific to a geographic segment. This field is also used to indicate that a community is split by SAG Areas or SAG Entities. Sample value: G307 (P)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="remark" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SAG level Remark (RMK). Sample value: S OFF CHAPEL LN IN MANCHACA ZONE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="remarkForTelephoneNumber" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sag level Remark for TN Lists (RMKT). Sample value: KIRKWOOD WIRE CENTER 214-748-9250</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="exco"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange (combination of exchange code 3-char and central office 2-char in the W). Sample value: LA AN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rateCenterCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate Center code for the location. Sample value: MOJAVE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="independentCompanyIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE Independent Company Indicator. The ones in AL, MS are for consolidated billing only. The ones in TN and NFL are for ALEC addresses or OOF</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="outOfRegionIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>OVALS/MLDB derives this by region specific criteria. Location is not in the ATT Territory. True means that the address location is not in the ATT Territory. false or null means that the address location is in the ATT territory.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="crossBoundaryState" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SE region cross boundary state. Sample value: FL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="primaryNPANXX" type="cng:PhoneNpaNxxInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A 6 character code that indicates the PRIMARY NPA NXX.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="e911Exempt" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MW E911 Exempt. Sample value: XH</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="e911NonRecurringCharge" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MW E911 non recurring charge. Sample value: CH</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="e911Surcharge" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MW E911 surcharge. Sample value: CH</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="e911Surcharge4PercentIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MW E911 surcharge 4 percent indicator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="e911Surcharge16PercentIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MW E911 surcharge 16 percent indicator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="lineStationTransfer" type="cng:CLLI11Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CLLI code from RSAG for SE only.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="assignedHouseNumberStatus" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This is derived for SE SAG ranges only. Is set to 1 when RANGE_TYPE_CD is N (numbered). Is set to '2' or '3' when RANGE-TYPE_CD is U (unnumbered) and populated as the same value populated in AHN_TYPE_CD (2 or 3).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="assignedHouseNumberTypeCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The SAG Address type. Values=S,T,X for SW and W. 2,3 for SE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="descriptiveForMultipleBasicAddresses" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This is for descriptive addresses only. The descriptive is for a range of basics or not.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="localServingOfficeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>LocalServingOfficeCode for the address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="fccWireCenterStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Presence of this tag indicates FCC Wire Center Trial applies for the LU/WTN.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AlternativeLocation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Alternative list of locations - no exact match.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="AlternativeAddressList" type="cng:AddressFieldedUnfieldedInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A list of alternative addresses. Address data is in "Fielded" format structure.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="RangedAddressList"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A list of SAG ranged addresses.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="houseNumberLow" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="houseNumberHigh" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="houseNumberPrefix" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="houseNumberPrefixHigh" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="houseNumberSuffix" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="houseNumberSuffixHigh" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetDirection" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetThoroughfare" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetNameSuffix" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="primaryStreetUnnamedIndicator" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicator derived and set to true by OVALS/MLDB when a primary street name is unnamed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="city"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="state" type="cng:AddressStateInfo"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="PostalCode" type="cng:AddressZipInfo"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="county" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="country" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="abbreviatedCity" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rangeType" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The SAG Address range type. U = Unnumberd Address (means AHN is assigned), N= Numbered Address (means house number is assigned).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="oddEvenType" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Odd and even code for an address range. Indicates if the address range is odd, even, or both odd and even. Values are: O, E, B</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="OriginalRequestData"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalStreetDirection" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalStreetName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalStreetThoroughfare" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalStreetNameSuffix" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalCity" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="originalCity2" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="AddressMatchResult" type="cng:AddressValidationResultInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This existing structure is for Pitney Bowes UC, LIM postal, and LIM E911 validation results. Structure containing address(es) validated [matched] or alternatives. Additional information related to the individual address may be returned in additional, optional elements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Response" type="cng:ResponseInfo"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

Used to be required by GCS but is now optional. It will not be used by CAPM.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="AmountDetail" type="cng:WirelineAmountInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount Detail - for sending payment (amount) information related to CreditCard or PaymentProfile. - sending amount in CreditCard.amount will throws an exception.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="partialAuthorizationIndicator" type="cng:BooleanTrueInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Set to true if partial approval on credit card is requested. Applicable only to mode 5.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AffiliateRegionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AffiliateSalesRepCodeInfo"> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AmountInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AttentionInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BankAccountNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name on Bank Account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BankAccountTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>C = Checking, S = Savings</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BankRoutingNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Bank Routing Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillDeliveryMethodInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Current allowed values: P = Paper, X = Paperless</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingAccountIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing Account Id including 3 character customer code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="13"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing account number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{8}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{12}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{13}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingCycleInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Day of month billing will occur on</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:short"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingMarketInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing System Market</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingMediaInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please contact Cingular business to identify correct Billing Media Type. For a sample reference please look at Bill Media spreadsheet under ../Documentation/CingularDataModel/</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingSystemIdentifierInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing System Identifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingTelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing Telephone Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BooleanStringInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TRUE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FALSE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BooleanTrueInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"> <xs:pattern value="true"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BusinessTaxIdLastFourDigitsInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Last four digits of the businessTaxId</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="4"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BusinessTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The value marks the base representation of the business types options Required when the accountType is = "B" for business Valid values are: Corporation - C Partnership - P Sole Ownership - S Small Business Personal Liability (SBPL) - B</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>The business type 'B' (SBPL) can be used for account inquiry only (it cannot be used for account creation and update).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CLLI11Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Common Language Location Identifier in 8 or 11 character format. Relates to wireline circuit.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CLLI8Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Common Language Location Identifier in 8 character format. Relates to a successfully validated Service Address - sbcServingOfficeWirecenter. For example - "78541256".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CallTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Call Type Info M2M - Mobile To Mobile M2A - Mobile to Application M2W - Mobile to Web A2M - Application To Mobile E2M - Email to Mobile W2M - Web To Mobile M2E - Mobile to Email M2P - Mobile to Personal Storage Locker (PSL)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="M2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2A"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2W"/> <xs:enumeration value="A2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="E2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="W2M"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2E"/> <xs:enumeration value="M2P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CashierIdInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CheckAccountTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Checking, Savings, Financial Institution</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:enumeration value=""/> <xs:enumeration value="Checking"/> <xs:enumeration value="Savings"/> <xs:enumeration value="Other"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CombinedBillingStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Where: Y - Combined N - De-Combined, Not Enrolled P - Pending Combine D - Combined Billing Declined F - Future Dated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value=" "/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CompanyNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CountryCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>International standard (ISO) 3166-1 alpha-3 country code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="3"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CoverageAreaInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Local-L, Regional-R, National-N</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditApplicationTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRR - Format = YYMM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditCardNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name on Credit Card</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditCardTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of credit card used for transaction: AE - American Express, DINE - Diner's Club, DISC - Discovery Card, MC - Master Card, VISA - Visa Card</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="AE"/> <xs:enumeration value="DINE"/> <xs:enumeration value="DISC"/> <xs:enumeration value="MC"/> <xs:enumeration value="VISA"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditClassInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines the credit risk CARE Markets: 1-8, P (description varies by accountType) Telegence Markets: A - Government Account, B - Known Good Credit, C - Unknown Credit, D - Known Poor Credit, E - Employee, M - MABEL (Major Account Billing Exchange Logistical)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditDebitIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>8 for a normal credit card request. 16 for a debit request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="8"/> <xs:enumeration value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CrossBoundaryStateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Received from LIM BIS. This is only applicable for Southeast addresses.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CurrencyAmountInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A monetary currency value</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:pattern value="\-?\d{0,9}(\.\d{1,2})?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CustomerCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The customer code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CustomerIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Optional, please set if it is available.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DataUOM"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The data unit of measurement</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>BY=Bytes, KB=Kilobytes, MB=Megabytes, GB=Gigabyes, TB=Terabytes, MI=Minutes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="BY"/> <xs:enumeration value="KB"/> <xs:enumeration value="MB"/> <xs:enumeration value="GB"/> <xs:enumeration value="TB"/> <xs:enumeration value="MI"/> <xs:enumeration value="$"/> <xs:enumeration value="CAD"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DataUnit"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The data unit</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:totalDigits value="13"/> <xs:fractionDigits value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DataUsageCategoryInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The data usage category</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>SMS - SMS Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>MMS - MMS Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>GPRS - GPRS Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>VSC - Video Sharing Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>IMB - Integrated Messaging Bucket</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>SMI - SMS to International Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>MMI - MMS to International Usage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>VXC - MMS - Personal Studio</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="GPRS"/> <xs:enumeration value="VSC"/> <xs:enumeration value="IMB"/> <xs:enumeration value="SMI"/> <xs:enumeration value="MMI"/> <xs:enumeration value="VXC"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateTimeWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date/time stamp in UTC format. The following formats are accepted: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.xxxZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - T is a fixed character, indicating the time section - hh indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - mm indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - ss indicates the second, zero pre-pended - xxx indicates the millisecond, zero pre-pended - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"> <xs:pattern value=".+T.+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date in UTC format. The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DDZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"> <xs:pattern value=".+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithoutTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date with no timezone information. The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DD Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DeviceNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>User-friendly description of the device.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DeviceViolationTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>'T' = Tethering, 'S' = SIM Swap, 'F' = Features, 'A' = Activation, 'U' = Device Updation, 'M' = Family Manager</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="T"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DoNotMailBillIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Print and Hold = P, No Bill Printed = X, No Bill Presented Online = E. N = Bill will be printed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="X"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DoingBusinessAsInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Doing business as field</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DoubleDiscountRestrictionTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Subscriber Level = S, BAN Level= B</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EarlyTerminationFeeTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This field specifies the early termination fee type</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>E - Device</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>F - fixed</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>D - declining based on amortization schedule establieshed by the business</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EffectiveDateInfo"> <xs:restriction base="DateWithTimezoneInfo"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ElectronicSerialNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Electronic Serial Number of the cellular unit. billing number) is available).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="J"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OperatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>User ID of the user that is creating the record</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PamPaymentMethodInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the Method of Payment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction
